Key Match Events: India held to 119 runs by Pakistan
Pakistan needed 18 runs from 6 balls, then 12 runs from 2 balls, but only managed 113/7
Post-Match Reflections: Emotional reactions from fans and spectators
The match was celebrated as a national holiday in Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the T20 World Cup being co-hosted by the U.S.
The crowd was a mix of first- and second-generation Americans
Others: The match was delayed due to rain
The match was played on Long Island
